name: dear sunshine
content:
The way you glow through my blinds in the morning.
It makes me feel like you missed me.
Kissing my forehead to help me out of bed.
Making me rub the sleepy from my eyes.

Are you asking me to come out and play?
Are you trusting me to wish away a rainy day?
I look above. The sky is blue.
It's a secret, but I trust you too.

If it wasn't for you, I could sleep forever.
But I'm not mad.

I want breakfast.

name: eagles can fly
content:
Monkeys can climb.
Crickets can leap.
Horses can race.
Owls can seek.
Cheetahs can run.
Eagles can fly.
People can try.
But that's about it

name: save me
content:
The colors, they won't stop.
Bright, beautiful colors
Flashing, expanding, piercing
Red, green, blue
An endless
cacophany
Of meaningless
noise


The noise, it won't stop.
Violent, grating waveforms
Squeaking, screeching, piercing
Sine, cosine, tangent
    Like playing a chalkboard on a turntable
        Like playing a vinyl on a pizza crust
An endless
poem
Of meaningless























Load Me

content: Inflicts Res-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

name: threaten res 2
content: Inflicts Res-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

name: threaten res 3
content: Inflicts Res-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

name: threaten spd 1
content: Inflicts Spd-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

name: threaten spd 2
content: Inflicts Spd-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

name: threaten spd 3
content: Inflicts Spd-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

name: ward armor
content: Grants armored allies within 2 spaces Def/Res+4 during combat.

name: ward cavalry
content: Grants cavalry allies within 2 spaces Def/Res+4 during combat.

name: ward fliers
content: Grants flying allies within 2 spaces Def/Res+4 during combat.

name: deflect magic 1
content: If unit receives consecutive attacks from a foe using magic, damage from second attack onward reduced by 30%.

name: deflect magic 2
content: If unit receives consecutive attacks from a foe using magic, damage from second attack onward reduced by 50%.

name: deflect magic 3
content: If unit receives consecutive attacks from a foe using magic, damage from second attack onward reduced by 80%.

name: deflect melee 1
content: If unit receives consecutive attacks from a foe using a sword, lance, or axe, damage from second attack onward reduced by 30%.

name: deflect melee 2
content: If unit receives consecutive attacks from a foe using a sword, lance, or axe, damage from second attack onward reduced by 50%.

name: deflect melee 3
content: If unit receives consecutive attacks from a foe using a sword, lance, or axe, damage from second attack onward reduced by 80%.

name: deflect missile 1
content: If unit receives consecutive attacks from a foe using a bow or dagger, damage from second attack onward reduced by 30%.

name: deflect missile 2
content: If unit receives consecutive attacks from a foe using a bow or dagger, damage from second attack onward reduced by 50%.

name: deflect missile 3
content: If unit receives consecutive attacks from a foe using a bow or dagger, damage from second attack onward reduced by 80%.

name: embla's ward
content: Unit receives 0 damage.

name: hardy bearing 1
content: Disables skills that change unit's attack priority. If unit has 100% HP at start of battle, enemy skills that change attack priority are also disabled.

name: hardy bearing 2
content: Disables skills that change unit's attack priority. If unit has >= 50% HP at start of battle, enemy skills that change attack priority are also disabled.

name: hardy bearing 3
content: Disables skills that change unit's attack priority. Enemy skills that change attack priority are also disabled.

name: phantom spd 1
content: When any skill compares this unit's Spd stat to another unit's, this unit's Spd stat is counted as +5 over actual value.

name: phantom spd 2
content: When any skill compares this unit's Spd stat to another unit's, this unit's Spd stat is counted as +8 over actual value.

name: phantom spd 3
content: When any skill compares this unit's Spd stat to another unit's, this unit's Spd stat is counted as +10 over actual value.

name: quickened pulse
content: Special cooldown count -1 at start of Turn 1.

name: squad ace a 1
content: Grants HP+3.

name: squad ace a 2
content: Grants HP+4.

name: squad ace a 3
content: Grants HP+5.

name: squad ace b 1
content: Grants Def+1.

name: squad ace b 2
content: Grants Def+2.

name: squad ace b 3
content: Grants Def+3.

name: squad ace c 1
content: Grants Res+1.

name: squad ace c 2
content: Grants Res+2.

name: squad ace c 3
content: Grants Res+3.

name: squad ace c 9
content: If unit is off the objective, team instantly loses the match

name: squad ace d 1
content: Grants Spd+1.

name: squad ace d 2
content: Grants Spd+2.

name: squad ace d 3
content: Grants Spd+3.

name: kitty paddle-
content: Effective against foe using magic. After combat, if foe uses magic, foe suffers Def/Res-5 through foe's next action

name: kitty paddle
content: Effective against foe using magic. After combat, if foe uses magic, foe suffers Def/Res-7 through foe's next action

name: warding stance 1
content: Grants Res+2 during combat when this unit is attacked.

name: warding stance 2
content: Grants Res+4 during combat when this unit is attacked.

name: warding stance 3
content: Grants Res+6 during combat when this unit is attacked.

name: dagger valor 1
content:
If unit survives and uses a dagger, unit gets 1.5x SP.
(If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

name: dagger valor 2
content:
If unit survives, all dagger users on team get 1.5x SP.
(If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

name: dagger valor 3
content:
If unit survives, all dagger users on team get 2x SP.
(If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applies.)

name: bracing blow 1
content: Grants Def/Res+2 during combat if unit initiates combat.

name: bracing blow 2
content: Grants Def/Res+4 during combat if unit initiates combat.

name: atk/res bond 1
content: Grants Atk/Res+1 to this unit during combat if unit is adjacent to an ally

name: atk/res bond 2
content: Grants Atk/Res+3 to this unit during combat if unit is adjacent to an ally

name: atk/res bond 3
content: Grants Atk/Res+5 to this unit during combat if unit is adjacent to an ally

name: fierce stance 1
content: Grants Atk+2 during combat when this unit is attacked.

name: fierce stance 2
content: Grants Atk+4 during combat when this unit is attacked.

name: fierce stance 3
content: Grants Atk+6 during combat when this unit is attacked.

name: hp res 1
content: Grants HP+3, Res+1.

name: hp res 2
content: Grants HP+4, Res+2.

name: flashing blade 1
content:
If unit's Spd - foe's Spd >= 5, unit gains Special cooldown charge +1 per attack.
(If using other similar skill, only highest value applied.)

name: flashing blade 2
content:
If unit's Spd - foe's Spd >= 3, unit gains Special cooldown charge +1 per attack.
(If using other similar skill, only highest value applied.)

name: flashing blade 3
content:
If unit's Spd - foe's Spd >= 1, unit gains Special cooldown charge +1 per attack.
(If using other similar skill, only highest value applied.)

name: ice mirror
content: Reduces damage unit takes from foes 2 spaces away by 30%. If Special triggers, boosts unit's next attack by total damage was reduced (by any source, including other skills). Resets at end of combat. (Skill cannot be inherited)

name: atk/def bond 1
content: Grants Atk/Def+1 during combat if unit is adjacent to an ally.

name: atk/def bond 2
content: Grants Atk/Def+3 during combat if unit is adjacent to an ally.

name: atk/def bond 3
content: Grants Atk/Def+5 during combat if unit is adjacent to an ally.
